p: Bronchoalveolar lavage (BAL) samples were collected from hospitalized adult patients (≥18 years of age) during routine diagnostic workup following suspicion of infection at the Leuven University Hospitals, Leuven, Belgium. Fifty cases of “probable” or “proven” IA were identified according to the 2008 standard criteria of the European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer/Mycology Study Group (EORTC/MSG) [ 18]. BAL specimens were collected as described before [ 19]. All samples were stored at −80°C until use.
